name: Champions of Tomorrow
description:
Join the battle of the universe and fight for the glory of your people!

Champions of Tomorrow  is a multiplayer PVP competitive game. Play with your friends in classic modes such as Team Deathmatch and Free for All in a futuristic roman setting.

Choose from an other-worldly ninja to a death consumed robot and bend  the laws of physics or equip your mighty magical katana. The choice is yours.

Main Features 

Multiplayer Chaos: 3D online multiplayer, FPS arena shooter.

Battle YOUR way: Various characters, each one possessing their own unique abilities.

Controls

Champions of Tomorrow is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses. 

Player movement - WASD

Camera Movement - Mouse

Jump - Space

Offensive Ability - LShift

Defensive Ability - Q

Ultimate Ability - E

Shoot - LMB

Reload - R

Pause - Esc

Further Information

Champions of Tomorrow was developed in the University Lusófona, third year (2020), Bachelor in Videogames. Credits:
